comment: It's ok.. but after using the iPhone version in the past, this Android version is a joke. Good for basic stat keeping but nothing else. It's been long enough now that this Android version should have been fixed.

reply.author: Shotzoom Software
reply.content:
We would love to hear more about your feedback; The Android Version should be up to par with the iOS version. Contact our team at support@golfshot.com so we can provide any troubleshooting tips to improve your experience. 

Thanks!

author: Rolly Lazaro
comment: I always use this apps everytime I play golf to record my scores and check the distance. But there is a course with no network do the gps cannot work. Comparwd to other apps this is more easier to use and most recommeded. I already shared this apps to my golf buddies and they start using it as well.

author: Robert A
comment: I really like the layout of this app. I've been using it for several years now and of all the gps apps available this one has the best overall feel. It updates quickly and is fairly accurate. I just wish they had a Samsung app so I could use it on my Gear S3.
Great app has many courses around the world. Truly great for a golfer.
The only golf app you need on your phone
The stats & layups have helped me lmprove

author: Tony Russell
comment: Very good app.
Great for mapping tournament rounds before getting to an unknown course

author: Rod Clifford
comment: Gr8 application

author: Vico Chu
comment: Easy to uses

author: Joseph Klan
comment: Great app

author: Ray
comment: Works great on my Samsung Galaxy 6.  It does everything I need it to.  I turn off wifi to conserve battery and can get a whole round on a full charge.  I usually carry a battery charger to be safe though.  I recommend to all my golfing friends.   Customer support has been responsive when I have asked questions about mu subscription.

author: Dennis Miller
comment: Good App. A couple of improvements needed to be  competitive with SbS in  function and cost.  Needs to account for and display terrain elevation and winds. Yardage updates are slow to stabilize.  When starting on any hole other than #1 the app doesn't continue smoothly to #1 after #18. The flyover feature is marginally useful. Club recommendations are usually off by 2 to 3 clubs. Calculating wind effects and elevation differences would improve this feature.

author: Joshua King
comment: The app is very good, doesn't use a ton of battery on the phone, but it'll kill your smartwatch. Tracking functionality on the smart watch is missing a key feature of tracking the direction of your ball (right, left, center), so it's not nearly as useful as it could be. If the course map isn't accurate, you're basically hosed for any kind of tracking and distances to the pin.

author: Dan the Computer Man
comment: Awesome app. Have over 500 rounds in so far. Stats are great, scorekeeping is quick and easy. Only complaint is that you're limited to a foursome. Also glad you can play for skins and other games. Website also shows all games played. Well worth the money. Would buy again.

On my Samsung it sucks.  I dont have most of the features my husband has on his iPhone, and the distances to green are all over the place so I am never sure what the real distance is -- I have to ask him the distance on each shot. I have been told it is going to be upgraded. In the meantime, it is Totally worthless.

author: Marc DiBuono
comment: I've had Golfshot for over 4 years and use it every round. Can mess up once in a while. Be sure to give the GPS sufficient time to settle on the correct yardage. Not the most accurate GPS out there, but I love the access to stats and handicap tracking.

author: Jeff Bogensberger
comment: Distances were sketchy at best.  Be careful, your subscription auto renews and I have been trying for over a month to cancel mine but no one can tell me how.

reply.author: Shotzoom Software
reply.content:
Hi Jeff, 

Distances are calculated using your phones internal GPS chip; please contact our team for tips on how to improve the performance of your device. Subscriptions can be managed by signing into your Google Play Store account; our team can also assist with this if you write into that support address. 

Thanks!

author: macahara
comment: Beware!  I was offered a $9.99 special to upgrade to golfshot pro, which I did, and a year later, they automatically billed my credit card $30 for another year, which I ABSOLUTELY did not authorize.  The ONLY way to contact customer service to cancel is through e-mail,  and when I e-mailed, I got a response saying they couldn't find my account.  I e-mailed back with my account information, and never heard another thing.    I complained to my credit card company, who refunded the charge (at their own cost).  I would never do business again with this company who is misleading, unethical, and non-responsive.  They obviously just want to grab your money and forget about you.

author: Steve Lafleur
comment: App has been great for me, but a little clearer view of the fairways would be nice. Sometimes it's hard to see the water running across the fairway.

author: Samuel Mendoza
comment: Best golf app I've used to date! The people saying that the GPS takes too long to update or is all over the place just need to make one easy change in settings...got to settings and under battery life change GPS update to fastest uses most battery but the GPS will update right away other than that an option to only play 9 holes would be useful

author: James Crane
comment: Great app but since I upgraded to Oreo there are a few bugs. GPS is now inaccurate and slow to update.

author: Randy Jones
comment: Have used this app for several years.  It's easy to use, accurate and fun.  Recommend it to all my friends.

author: Susan de Leeuw
comment: App won't download properly. Left-hand side is missing course info and it refuses to allow me to score stableford points, only stroke play.

author: Ron Hagan
comment: I like the app but would like  more statistics.  I. e., what club I used for my approach shot & where did it go, distance from the flag on GIR, was my bunker shot from a fairway bunker or greens idea?  Those stats would be extremely useful.
Excellent. Way cheaper than buying a dedicated golf GPS device that would have inferior software any way. 👍👍👍

author: chris camilleri
comment: Great app strongly advise but not all courses in area available

author: Gabs San
comment: How come I can't see my friends profiles in the app? I can only do that on the website!? Please fix!!

author: Charles Muringai
comment: The iPhone version is .ore complete disappointed with this version, lacks everything that makes it so great on the iPhone.

author: Mike Mazzie
comment: Golf shot by far is the best golf app there is! Been using it for over 3 years now, I love it! GPS is awesome and love how it saves all score cards.

author: Rich Shine
comment: Really like the app. Upgraded to be able to check distances to traps, trees and water. Distances given agree with high end watches and Garmin rangefinders. I think it's a great value.

author: Simon godwin
comment: Very nice straight forward to use when your out on the course

author: Ravinder Gill
comment: Keep detail scores that can be reviewed later to improve the weakness in the game.

author: James Bulman
comment: Good app, user interface can be a bit clunky and the pro upgrade gets in your face too often, but great functions for free still.

author: Richard Shirt
comment: Great app. Works well with my android watch giving me distance to centre of green. Doesn't drain battery whilst playing 18 holes on phone or watch.

author: Jon Robbins
comment: Not sure my phone or app,but when screen would go to sleep as I drive to ball. Would lose tracking distance
Great Golf GPS app

author: Saltwater Cowboy
comment: Works well. Has most of the golf courses in my area. Not sure if the yardage is very accurate

author: Gareth Gray
comment: A great app that also offers a free version. It really helps with my yardage. Thumbs up to the team at Golfshot.

author: jacob woolman
comment: Love the ability to look a the statistics of each round as well a la multiple rounds.  GPS is great!
